subject: Trades (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Matt Diaz, formerly of the Braves, agreed to a minor league deal but could become the Yankees’ fourth outfielder or right-handed designated hitter, if he is impressive in spring training.
snippet: Matt Diaz, formerly of the Braves, agreed to a minor league deal but could become the Yankees’ fourth outfielder or right-handed designated hitter, if he is impressive in spring training.
